member.name: M:Dermalog.AFIS.FourprintSegmentation.FourprintSegmenation.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios. If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
member.exception: Accures if the nessary libraries are missing

member.name: T:Dermalog.AFIS.FourprintSegmentation.LicenseException
member.summary:
This exception occurs when no SDK License is available on target machine.
No DERMALOG Scanner is connected into the PC
DERMALOG Licenser is not installed on system
DERMALOG Licenser is installed but no license exist for this SDK
